General.Name: Guangdong Hongtu Technology Holdings Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong Hongtu Technology (holdings) Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells precision aluminum alloy die castings and related accessories used in automotive, communication, and electromechanical products in China. It also researches, develops, manufactures, and sells bulletproof, special safety, special industrial, and new energy electric vehicles, as well as other special vehicle products. In addition, the company produces and sells automobile signboards, radiator grilles, and interior and exterior trims for air conditioning outlets, as well as other internal and external accessories. Further, it offers investment and support services for the strategic development, industrial upgrading, and business-related diversification of listed companies; and fund management services. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Zhaoqing, China.
